t:
I went down to check the basement after moving in the new house.



Not finding anything scary
I turned back to go, only to find that the door was no longer there.
c:
Then, I heard the voices of a family from above.



#basement #house #scary #check #door #disappear #trapped #lockedinsidehouse





https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fritzl_case, which I read long back, and the lockdown.
